review_data.title: Awful bartender
review_data.content: Bar man was sooo rude. Worse place visited in Zurich. Left before drinks were properly ordered. Very aggressive and no manners. So many wonderful places to visit in this beautiful city. This is not one of them. Never ever written a bad review before. But...More

review_data.title: Poor service and experience.
review_data.content: Poor service and experience. Pampered to a group in the corner and left us waiting for 3 songs worth. Not exactly busy as only a few around the bar so no excuse for being busy. Only good thing ... Pianist. Walked out without being served.

review_data.title: Dantes Inferno
review_data.content: on entrance...All is plausable and a lulling calm. The piano man works and you are but a rat mesmerised by the pied piper/ Do not enter. It attracts the lowest form of humanity. be warned Dante described this succintly. Do Not goto this bar.. Hookers...More

review_data.title: Immer ein Besuch wert.
review_data.content: Tolle live Stimmung, nichts für Leute mit Platzangst.... ein Zürcher Klassiker. Für mich die beste Livemusic-Bar.

review_data.title: Piano and Dancing
review_data.content: The place in Zurich for live piano and dancing. Like in another world you feel here. Very mixed crowed and great fun. Any day of the week you meet great people here. I love this place. Go for a drink, enjoy dance and live music

review_data.title: Preise sind eine Frechheit
review_data.content: 8.50,- für eine Cola ist definitiv zu viel. Auch für einen solchen Ort. Stimmung ok. Für eher ältere Leute.

review_data.title: Fun night at the piano bar!
review_data.content: The live music (piano) here is excellent. lots of classic songs and a fun night out while in Zurich! Great bartenders/service as well.

review_data.title: Viel zu teuer. Kein Mehrwert.
review_data.content: Viel zu teuer. Kein Mehrwert. Schlechtes personal. Kleines Bier 9.50. Kostet wie ein stripclub aber ohne die dienstleistung

review_data.title: Busy bar
review_data.content: A bustling, crowded bar on a Friday night. Pianist in full flow playing easy listening numbers from 60s and 70s.

review_data.title: monday night.....piano bar and dance
review_data.content: all over think that monday night is a dead evening.. to go out... in zurich i was lucky to know local people that take me in this....place.. so nice with a pianobar great to sing dance and take particolr coffe

review_data.title: Few beers
review_data.content: Looking for somewhere to grab a beer after midnight. Found this place - very cool , plenty of seating. Unusual in its 70s decor but that added to charm as did the pianist who was a good source of entertaiment. So recommend-

review_data.title: Lovely atmosphere
review_data.content: Had a nice night in the bar. The music is okay, a bit popular, do not expect anything sophisticated or fancy. Dancing is allowed, and you should do it. Drinks are pricey--as everything in Zürich. It's a fun night out!

review_data.title: Costosissimo
review_data.content: Locale bellissimo al centro di Zurigo, visita effettuata con amici. Unica pecca, il prezzo eccessivo, pensate, 1 gin tonic pagato...More

review_data.title: Great piano bar
review_data.content: Its all about piano and the bar. Really nice bar with good atmosphere, friendly service and good drinks. The music tonight was good and it was not crowded on a Thursday evening. Good place dor sure !

review_data.title: A Tiny Piano Bar With A Party Atmosphere
review_data.content: Whenever I want to listen music and sway my hips then I visit this newly renovated piano bar tucked in an alley in the old town of Zurich. From 9pm onwards particularly on Fridays and Saturdays this tiny place can be very crowded. The pianist...More

review_data.title: Best piano bar in Zürich
review_data.content: Have been a regular at this place for over 20 years,great atmosphere fantastic service, gets busy on friday saturday after 11pm

review_data.title: Little Piano Bar on side street
review_data.content: Not much of a place here. Piano player/singer was American and not bad. Almost no one around even at 10 pm except a couple of drunk tourists. Nice décor but no ambiance nor was customer service a priority. No real reason to go here.

review_data.title: Piano Bar - eine Institution in Zürich
review_data.content: Seit Jahrzehnten eine Institution. Immer immer wieder viele Besuche wert. Ich kann nur hoffen, daß diese bar niemals schließen wird.

review_data.title: Best piano bar ever

review_data.title: Relaxing live mudic

review_data.title: Nice out of way dance place
review_data.content: No techno music here. But a great place with a piano bar and dancing. My wife and I had a great time.

review_data.title: Late night sing song around a piano
